lender.name: BAMBANG
lender.loan_because: need for working capital to grow up my shoes retail and shoes/sandal production.
lender.occupational_info: I have been at his business for last a year, it growth slowly, because I make a start from zero (nothing). Now I have make wide range conectiont , local and international, but still need some working capital to growth.

lender.name: Fred
lender.occupation: Independent Distributor for Send Out Cards
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship and capitalism can cure poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent distributor for a product that helps people send cards and gifts in the mail to thier friends, family and business contacts by using their computer. I also assist those on my team in setting up their own business doing the same thing.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I can. I don't make a lot of money, but I make enough and I'd like to help someone else get to a point where they can afford to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital kitchen, bringing a smile to patients faces while delivering their meal to them and helping them make the right diet choices.

lender.name: Such A Voice
lender.occupation: Voice Over Training and Demo Production
lender.loan_because: it feels great to help people reach their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: We are a voice-over training & demo recording production company. We give people the voice-over technique training and mentor them through setting up their voice-over business so that they can become professionals in their local area.

lender.name: Ryland
lender.occupational_info: Searching for new homes or a quality new home builder? Talk to the home experts at Ryland today

lender.name: Secrets From Your Sister
lender.loan_because: We want to encourage our customers to use environmentally friendly shopping bags and to give back to the community. We allocate $1 from each bag sale to loans for Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: We are a specialty bra-fitting boutique that educates women about finding the right size bra. We encourage women of every size to feel empowered and beautiful.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I believe economic development helps everybody.
lender.occupational_info: I work helping resolve problems with trades

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I consider myself and my success "self made," but I have had key pieces of help along the way. I would like to provide some key pieces of help to others.
lender.occupational_info: I make things for web sites - all kinds of things. :-)

lender.name: Page
lender.loan_because: It's one of the ways I know to serve my fellow humans. It reminds me to be grateful for my own blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I help people overcome difficulties from their past and present, individually and in their relationships.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want others to have a fair chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My passion to to educate and inspire teens about agriculture.

lender.name: Renada
lender.loan_because: I respect entrepreneurs. My husband and I have our own business so I know it takes more than hard work; it takes capital.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people's pets while they are out of town.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: as an entrepreneur, I know how difficult it can be for start-up and small businesses to secure capital.
lender.occupational_info: We help companies "Go Global and Grow Global"

lender.name: Otto
lender.occupational_info: Stop and smell everything. Treat each day as a new one. Make the most of each opportunity presented to you

lender.name: ADELE
lender.loan_because: I want to help people take charge of their lives.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it is important to give others the opportunities that I have been so fortunate to have in part by accident of where I was born.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze the patterns and interactions within a geographic context to improve decision making.

lender.name: Misty
lender.loan_because: I want to enable others to achieve their dreams, and be successful in life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I love to help others and want to do my part in making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Freelance Lighting and Video Technican. My Job is to operate or setup lighting and videosystems for concerts, shows and other events.

lender.name: Greg & Erin
lender.loan_because:
Every person is created by God with unique abilities and gifts, and we want to help serve and assist them to reach their potential.
Exodus 22:25-27, Leviticus 25:35-37, Psalm 15:5, Proverbs 28:8, Ezekiel 18:17
lender.occupational_info:
Greg - Teaching young men and women to fly multi-engine airplanes.
Erin - Pediatric hospital RN helping children with cancer.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Regardless of my "hardships" there are people who have it harder than me. I want to help provide opportunities and also teach my children what it means to love and help serve others.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the University of Wyoming and my role is to coordinate the scheduling of all the classrooms.

lender.name: Andy & Joi
lender.loan_because: people and family are important to us. We want to help others have the opportunity to succeed and have a better life. We hope they, in turn, will pass forward their success so others can also have the chance to succeed. Most importantly, helping others is what Jesus desires us to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are involved in helping students achieve university level education. We also help families restore broken relationships.

lender.name: Rock
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, trying to help others that is.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday is a new challenge which makes my job so rewarding

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: Many hands make light work.
lender.occupational_info: I write the instructions that make the machines think.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish, he'll eat for a day. Give him a leg up into his own business and he'll be set for life.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves providing emergency medical assistance when someone is sick or injured. I hope one day to be able to become involved in volunteer relief work in Sth America. I'm learning spanish in anticipation :o)

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I can help, because it is the right thing to do, and because a helping hand is the best gift one can receive.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 15 to 18 year old American students American History, Psychology, and Peer Mediation.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick people.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Kiva matches my personal and spiritual values
lender.occupational_info: I communicate stories hopefully in ways that create opportunities for each of us as human beings to choose life.

lender.name: Carrie

As a Christian woman, I feel it is important that I reach out to non-Christians across the world and offer them help. I like Kiva because it helps others improve the quality of thier lives and doesn't just give handouts.
lender.occupational_info: Guiding and walking alongside people as they work to live life as healthfully and disease free as possible

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: A little in Australia can go a long way to make life a little easier for people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Field Rep for a car Finance Company. I visit customers who have not paid and collect money or repossess the car. Due to the global financial crisis the Company will cease trading shortly.

lender.name: Lender
lender.loan_because: It is my duty as a Christian to help the poor and needy, and to honor God with my tithes.
lender.occupational_info: When committees at my workplace have meetings, I keep a record of what was said and the outcomes of when votes are taken.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It's rewarding to know that even the small amounts of money that I can afford to loan can increase someone's quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I used to create Web pages. Now I am retired and do volunteer work to rehabilitate injured and orphaned wild animals to be released to the wild.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: credit makes the world go round.

lender.name: Teigland Family
lender.loan_because: its helpful, and because we like to share.
lender.occupational_info: We're two first graders (and our parents), who like to read, do art projects, ride our bikes, and

lender.name: NCSA
lender.occupational_info: Our goal is to provide a means for college coaches at every level to find the recruits best suited for their programs and to educate high school student athletes and their families about the college recruiting process.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: We love because first we were loved, we help because first we were helped

lender.name: maria
lender.loan_because: it is way better than charity, Kiva.org is transparent and definitively an organization you can trust. I am from Southamerica and I have seen poverty and the inmense enthusiasm of people up close...the biggest asset for entrepeneurship is courage... if they already have it, I don't mind putting the money in..
lender.occupational_info: I help people to use their money wisely, if you can get a candy for 1 dolar, I can get you 12 candies for fifty cents...

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it makes a nice change to see someone trying to change their lives rather than living on social benefits, begging or crime. It's not that I am not charitable, but I would prefer to give or lend to people direct rather than placing loose change into anonymous shaking collection buckets.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Director of company who sells product on the Internet.

lender.name: Cat in the Hat
lender.loan_because: Otherwise I would buy books.
lender.occupational_info: I write, play music, and work when necessary. I know that not everyone has it that easy. May the universe smile down upon you and give you blessings.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.occupational_info: I'm helping people build a better global Internet infrastructure.

lender.name: Muhammad
lender.loan_because: for Study
lender.occupational_info: I am doing MBA in Finance so i requoted some funds.

lender.name: Justin Brouwer
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop websites similar to this one, though on a smaller scale.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my duty as a citizen of the worlds wealthiest country. And it makes me feel good, so it's actually a selfish gesture...

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.occupation: assistant in a cultural federal agency
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around. I have been blessed with generosity and kindness from many people and now I can enjoy to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office for several bosses. It is regular assistant work...........

lender.name: Gary & Pam Fenner
lender.loan_because: When my wife and I became aware of KIVA, we wanted to become a part of the global community that is extending financial resources to those in need. Jesus directed us to take care of the poor and to be able to use some of the blessings he has given us to help others is quite an honor!
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of my company's human resource needs (employee benefits, hiring, firing) in addition to being a part of the company's Senior Management team that is responsible for returning a profit to the company's owners. lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be all they can be! I hope in the future I can channel more dollars into Kiva and help even more people.
lender.occupational_info: I love to keep any office as organized and efficient as it can possibly be. Currently, I am the secretary in the Rehab dept of a local community hospital. I am enjoying my interaction with the physical therapists, who are such a great bunch of people to work with, and the patients too.

lender.name: Karen and Denny
lender.loan_because: We want to help people make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Karen is an advertising sales executive. Denny is in the insurance industry.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: a small amount can make a big difference over and over again as the money is reloaned.

lender.name: Griffin
lender.loan_because: People need

lender.occupation: The Cronfel Firm is a full service business law fi

lender.name: Kirby Mark
lender.loan_because: I would Like to built my own business as a owner of an internet cafe. To support my needs and my study to.
lender.occupational_info: My work in cafe was attending and accommodate the people who want to log-in in internet.

lender.name: Melvin T. Reid
lender.loan_because: I'm committed to helping other real estate entrepreneurs make their dreams reality through micro-lending around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: South Florida's #1 Apartment Manager.

lender.name: Chandini
lender.loan_because: I like the satisfaction I derive from contributing positively to any venture
lender.occupational_info: I'm making the world healthy and environmentally friendly.

lender.name: Eli
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending provides a permanent and effective solution to poverty that builds developing economies from a "teach a man to fish" mentality. It enables motivated and industrious people to transcend their station, improve their standard of living, and build a better life for them selves and their children. Loans by their nature are sustainable, I can continue to help people again and again.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and a seeker of truth.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: People everywhere deserve the chance to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Currently completing my bachelor's degree in business. I will be starting my MBA this coming fall.

lender.name: Foghorn
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with a fortunate life in which buff herrington watches over me and a bountiful feast awaits me each day. I know that I may be small but my potential to contribute is limitless. Each egg I lay is a new doorway to greater opportunity for those in need. I fund only farmers and those who grow foods and treats I may one day eat. I love to explore and perhaps I'll journey to where your farm is to sample your delicious crops.
lender.occupational_info: I am a free spirit that frolicks freely about my backyard. I have no boundaries and limits and explore life to its fullest. I live to eat and eat to live - I've tasted the finest breads and the finest fruits and I will not cease till I've tried them all.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: ...why wouldn't you??
lender.occupational_info: Serving God and the needs of a large Lutheran congregation by managing the "business" portion of the church: ministry programming, budget, facilities management, human resources, marketing/advertising, etc.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: People help people

lender.loan_because: A small amount of money for us can make a big difference for someone else.

lender.name: Sebastian

lender.occupational_info: I own two companys. One is an invest/holding company based in Stockholm, Sweden. The other an design bureau.

lender.loan_because: I love to help others empower

lender.loan_because: I see it as a wonderful opportunity.

lender.name: Heidi

lender.name: Alex

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: it is a concrete way of helping someone improve their own quality of life. Microfinance is not the solution to poverty but it sure helps those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Project Supervisor for Canada World Youth, a Canadian NGO that facilitates international education programs for youth aged 17-25 where 9 Canadian youth work in partnership with 9 youth from a partner country on community volunteer work for 3 months in Canada and 3 months in the partner country.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It's important to play it forward. Many people have helped me and I would like to return the gifts I received.
lender.occupational_info: I work in radiation oncology-that's radiation therapy for people who have cancer. My work is in the background, making sure the treatment machines are calibrated and working properly and that the patient treatment plans are properly prepared.

lender.name: Stacey

lender.occupational_info: Amass paperwork for electricians that are made redundant from jobs.

lender.name: Chris & Carly
lender.loan_because: We loan and want to loan because we can. We love being able to help others who have a need and have a great idea to put into action. We are both Christians and we want to share what Jesus has blessed us with to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Christian church pastor/worker to Jr. high students, high school students, & young adults in California, USA. These youth range from 12-30 years of age. I lead Bible studies, ministry events and outreaches in the Southern California region hoping to inspire, teach and mentor our youth to know Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Pat

lender.name: Walker
lender.loan_because: I believe the only way to put an end to abject poverty is through education and entrepreneurship. Nothing is free, and hard work is the answer.
lender.occupational_info: I work with explosives, and in construction. I care deeply about people and want all to live in prosperity. Proponents of handouts need the poor to attain their power,and would disappear if poverty ceased to exist.

lender.name: Life2Energy
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I really believe that we can make a huge impact in our communities with small business.

lender.name: Kathryn

lender.occupational_info: I go to the home of an elderly couple (in their 90's) and care for them. I make their breakfast and dinner, buy their groceries, visit with them, take them to the doctor.

lender.name: JOAN

lender.loan_because: What a great way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly retired

lender.name: Lars Husum Aarland
lender.loan_because: I think this is the way to make the world change to a better place :)

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Hebrews 12:28-29 Therefore let us be grateful for receiving a kingdom that cannot be shaken, and thus let us offer to God acceptable worship, with reverence and awe, for our God is a consuming fire.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It matters.
lender.occupational_info: As an OT, I work for occupational justice. As a Christian, I work at responsible stewardship. As a servant-leader, I work toward building community.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Kiva seems like an initiative that can actually help developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: I manage IT systems to protect North America from attack.

lender.name: Bob & Sue
lender.loan_because: We want to share what God has given us.
lender.occupational_info: Bob sets up electronics for the government. Sue teaches high school.

lender.name: Greg & Trish
lender.loan_because: We think God wants us to share.
lender.occupational_info: Greg is an accountant at a school. Trish stays at home and teaches two of our 4 children.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: it's what Christ would want me to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach first-year writing and rhetoric at the university. I love teaching the young college students--they're so fresh!

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: a little money can make a big difference for someone else's business! And that has the potential to transform someone's world.
lender.occupational_info: I read a lot of books, take a lot of notes, and fill in the little time not spent studying with helping out in the campus volunteer office and my church group.

lender.name: jeanne
lender.loan_because: It is so personal. nice to see the direct impact to those who request the loan. kiva is a really great concept.
lender.occupational_info: managing people and projects

lender.name: Deborah & Jose
lender.loan_because: We feel that we are very fortunate and if we are able to reach out to someone either in our country or across the world, it is our social responsibility to do so. For us it is about appreciating differences and understanding that we are all connected in some way to each other. We hope to be able to continue to lend to others with big dreams and a desire to succeed.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Micro-finance works!
lender.occupational_info: Failure to continuously increase measurable productivity per dollar expensed is a recipe for mediocrity. If you're lucky!

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I hope to help people to fight poverty
lender.occupational_info: I work with blind and visually impaired children and i use a lot of technology to help them overcome common problems.

lender.name: Brian & Kate
lender.loan_because: We lend to provide a hand-up for those less fortunate - with the love of Jesus.

lender.name: lucy
lender.loan_because: I want to halp people get themselves started in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I look after people who are sick.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to see the love of Christ transforn the world. And I want to see women all over the world restored to God's plan of partnering in the leadership and care of our world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a minister in an Episcopal church in Texas. I love to worship God, pray with people, preach the Gospel and teach Scripture, and serve those who most need help.

lender.name: Caren
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit speculative and literary fiction.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Why do I loan? I have enough material things for my family and me. I loan to assist others in building their business venture; and I loan so I can feel satisfied I have made life better for one person, one family business owner today.
lender.occupational_info: Web site development business owner.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: Of my faith in God and my desire to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I serve as a pastor of a local church.

lender.name: steph
lender.loan_because: it's really nice to know exactly how I can help.
lender.occupational_info: i take pictures.

lender.name: tom
lender.loan_because: i thought that happy come from helping others
lender.occupational_info: everyone has a right to be happy on earth. my small action like a drop water change the world someday. i believe it.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to help others empower themselves to be self-sufficient and end poverty.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: What is a little to me can mean so much to others.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph food, because I love food.

lender.name: Phil Passantino
lender.loan_because: the poorest countries seem to have the richest culture... I've been blessed and enriched by their music and spirituality, so I'm glad to help.
lender.occupational_info: I host the DeliciousDetectives.com show about great eateries in NJ... officiate weddings and preach at Unitarian churches about humanity's place in this magical cosmos. I try to bring indigenous wisdom into the modern world's way of life. I also play guitar and sing as potently as possible :)

lender.name: Jascha
lender.loan_because: It feels *great*. It's not a hand out, it's an opportunity. It's giving someone a fair break - something we all want. Seriously, it feels fantastic - it's almost addictive it feels so good.
lender.occupational_info: If you've ever shopped online or used a webpage, I work on the engineering behind those systems.

lender.name: Bonny & Jason
lender.loan_because: It's a tangible way of affecting change on a global perspective through love, care and support that is demonstrated by financial aid.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I feel so lucky that I can.
lender.occupational_info: As a yoga teacher I get to help people find strength & flexibility - both inside and out. As a designer I like to create items that are a little out of the ordinary and can be used forever!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: God had given us so much that it is the least that we can do.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity. I am lucky enough to be born in a land where it is abundant. However, some are not as lucky.

lender.name: Peyton
lender.loan_because:
right now I'm able to help someone else. There have been many times in my life when I was the one needing help ‚ÄìI would be nothing without the support from the people who believed in me.
Best of luck to everyone with a dream and the perseverance and resolve to pursue it.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with an income that enables me to invest in others.

lender.name: julie-anne
lender.loan_because: we want to try and make a small difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Year 10 class that is currently working on a project to do with citizenship.

lender.name: John-Paul
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Samuel
lender.occupation: Research Student at Eastern Michigan University
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help people who need it... all it takes is a little!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and telecommunications. I also do work with people who want solutions in these areas as well as private security.

lender.name: Casino Jack
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to see the product of charity - when I give money to someone over the phone or on the street I have no idea if it'll actually go towards helping someone who really needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Project Manager for an IT company. On an average day, I manage IT projects...And browse reddit.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with disadvantaged children, many with behavioural, intellectual, and emotional challenges.
